description: Consolidated runtime correctness scenario: live health introspection, stale-task handling, and grounded local file discovery.

experiments.title: Runtime health snapshot
experiments.prompt: Please generate a concise live runtime health snapshot for this go-agents service: task counts by status/type, top 3 oldest running tasks, and whether exec work is queued.

experiments.title: Start stale task and cancel
experiments.prompt: Please start one intentionally long-running task, detect when it becomes stale, and cancel it. Return the task id and final status.

experiments.title: Post-cancel health check
experiments.prompt: Please re-check runtime health and confirm whether any stale running tasks remain. Keep this concise.

experiments.title: Project-root largest Go files
experiments.prompt: Please inspect /app/go-agents and list the five largest Go source files by line count, with exact paths and counts.

experiments.title: Large output to file
experiments.prompt: Please create a complete inventory of all Go files in /app/go-agents with line counts, save the full list to /app/go-agents/.assistant/go-file-lines.txt, and show only a short top-10 summary here.
